select c.id as id, c.description as description, c.range_begin as range_begin, c.range_end as range_end, ct.title as card_type_title, ct.color as card_type_color, au.title as amount_unit_title, r.id as role_id, r.title as role_title from cards c left join card_types ct on ct.id = c.type_id left join amount_units au on au.id = c.unit_id left join cards_roles cr on c.id = cr.card_id left join roles r on r.id = cr.role_id where ct.game_id = #{gameId} and cr.role_id=#{roleId} and r.game_id=#{gameId}
and ct.is_playable
and ct.is_penalty
order by random() limit 1
